languages.text: "Еще один {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g} в наших краях? Занятно. Вы всегда приходите в отчаянные времена, чтобы заключить сделку, выгодную лишь одной стороне".

traits.locale_text: "Еще один {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g} в наших краях? Занятно. Вы всегда приходите в отчаянные времена, чтобы заключить сделку, выгодную лишь одной стороне".

languages.text: "Another {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} in our corner of the galaxy? How interesting. Your kind always make an appearance in desperate times, ready to cut a deal that benefits one side alone."
languages.original_text: "Еще один {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g} в наших краях? Занятно. Вы всегда приходите в отчаянные времена, чтобы заключить сделку, выгодную лишь одной стороне".

traits.locale_text: "Another {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} in our corner of the galaxy? How interesting. Your kind always make an appearance in desperate times, ready to cut a deal that benefits one side alone."

"Another {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} in our corner of the galaxy? How interesting. Your kind always make an appearance in desperate times, ready to cut a deal that benefits one side alone."

"Another {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} in our corner of the galaxy? How interesting. Your kind always make an appearance in desperate times, ready to cut a deal that benefits one side alone."

"Another {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} in our corner of the galaxy? How interesting. Your kind always make an appearance in desperate times, ready to cut a deal that benefits one side alone."

languages.text: “又一位{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}跑到了银河系的这个角落？真是有趣。你们这种人总是会在别人走投无路的时候出现，随时准备狮子大开口。”
languages.original_text: "Another {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} in our corner of the galaxy? How interesting. Your kind always make an appearance in desperate times, ready to cut a deal that benefits one side alone."

traits.locale_text: “又一位{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}跑到了银河系的这个角落？真是有趣。你们这种人总是会在别人走投无路的时候出现，随时准备狮子大开口。”

languages.text: «¿Otr{mf|o|a} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} en este rincón de la galaxia? Interesante. Los suyos siempre aparecen en los tiempos desesperados, listos para ofrecer un acuerdo que solo beneficia a una de las partes».
languages.original_text: "Another {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} in our corner of the galaxy? How interesting. Your kind always make an appearance in desperate times, ready to cut a deal that benefits one side alone."

traits.locale_text: «¿Otr{mf|o|a} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} en este rincón de la galaxia? Interesante. Los suyos siempre aparecen en los tiempos desesperados, listos para ofrecer un acuerdo que solo beneficia a una de las partes».

languages.text: 「この銀河の片隅にまた別の{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}ローグトレーダー{/g}が？なんと面白い。あなたのような者たちは、いつも絶望的な時に現れるものだ。そして、一方的に有利な取引を進めようとしてくる」
languages.original_text: "Another {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} in our corner of the galaxy? How interesting. Your kind always make an appearance in desperate times, ready to cut a deal that benefits one side alone."

traits.locale_text: 「この銀河の片隅にまた別の{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}ローグトレーダー{/g}が？なんと面白い。あなたのような者たちは、いつも絶望的な時に現れるものだ。そして、一方的に有利な取引を進めようとしてくる」

languages.text: "Noch ein {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändler{/g} in unserer Ecke der Galaxie? Wie interessant. Euresgleichen erscheint immer in verzweifelten Zeiten und nur, um einen Handel einzugehen, von dem nur eine Seite profitiert."
languages.original_text: "Another {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} in our corner of the galaxy? How interesting. Your kind always make an appearance in desperate times, ready to cut a deal that benefits one side alone."

traits.locale_text: "Noch ein {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändler{/g} in unserer Ecke der Galaxie? Wie interessant. Euresgleichen erscheint immer in verzweifelten Zeiten und nur, um einen Handel einzugehen, von dem nur eine Seite profitiert."

languages.text: « {mf|Un autre|Une autre} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}{/g} dans notre recoin de la galaxie ? Intéressant. Les individus de votre espèce surgissent toujours aux pires moments, prêts à conclure des accords aux bénéfices unilatéraux. »
languages.original_text: "Another {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} in our corner of the galaxy? How interesting. Your kind always make an appearance in desperate times, ready to cut a deal that benefits one side alone."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Un autre libre-marchand|Une autre libre-marchande} dans notre recoin de la galaxie ? Intéressant. Les individus de votre espèce surgissent toujours aux pires moments, prêts à conclure des accords aux bénéfices unilatéraux. »

languages.text: "Galaksinin bu köşesinde bir {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g} daha mı? Enteresan. Hep de en çaresiz anlarda çıkageliyor, yalnızca bir tarafın yararına olacak anlaşmalar koparmaya hazır oluyorsunuz."
languages.original_text: "Another {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} in our corner of the galaxy? How interesting. Your kind always make an appearance in desperate times, ready to cut a deal that benefits one side alone."
